trans-unit.source: Associates a key string with <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticResultValue"></xref> values to define <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticValue"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: Knytter en nøkkel streng <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticResultValue"> </xref> verdiene for å definere <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticValue"> </xref> objekter.

trans-unit.source: The basic unit of semantic expression in System.Speech is the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticValue>, which is a key/value pair.
trans-unit.target: Basic semantisk uttrykk i System.Speech er den <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticValue>, som er en nøkkel/verdi-paret.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticValue>

trans-unit.source: Using SemanticResultKey objects, you tag <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticResultValue> instances contained in <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder> objects and strings so that the values may readily be accessed from <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticValue> instances on recognition.
trans-unit.target: Ved hjelp av SemanticResultKey objekter du merke <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticResultValue>forekomster i <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder>objekter og strenger slik at verdiene lett kan åpnes fra <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticValue>forekomster på gjenkjenning.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticValue> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticResultValue>

trans-unit.source: You can use <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticResultValue> and SemanticResultKey objects, in conjunction with <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder> and <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Choices> objects, to define the semantic structure for a speech recognition grammar.
trans-unit.target: Du kan bruke <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticResultValue>og SemanticResultKey objekter, sammen med <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder>og <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Choices>objekter, til å definere semantisk strukturen for en tale recognition grammatikk.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Choices> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticResultValue>

trans-unit.source: To access the semantic information in a recognition result, obtain an instance of <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticValue> through the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizedPhrase.Semantics%2A> property on <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizedPhrase>.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil hente semantisk informasjonen i fører recognition, kan du opprette en forekomst av <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticValue>via <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizedPhrase.Semantics%2A>egenskapen <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizedPhrase>.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizedPhrase> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizedPhrase.Semantics%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticValue>

trans-unit.source: For more information about using <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticResultValue> and SemanticResultKey objects, see [Understanding SemanticResultValue and SemanticResultKey Objects](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/0fea1236-5261-4608-89b3-9ce9ffc22a1c) and [Using a SemanticResultKey to Extract a SemanticResultValue](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/198e29b8-845f-4cec-a25e-f55c0eaf46aa) in the [System Speech Programming Guide for .NET Framework 4.0](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/610116c7-3817-40ff-857b-5d41e8511043).
trans-unit.target: For mer informasjon om hvordan du bruker <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticResultValue>og SemanticResultKey objekter, se [forstå SemanticResultValue og SemanticResultKey objekter](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/0fea1236-5261-4608-89b3-9ce9ffc22a1c) og [ved hjelp av en SemanticResultKey til å trekke ut en SemanticResultValue](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/198e29b8-845f-4cec-a25e-f55c0eaf46aa) i den [System tale Programming veiledning for .NET Framework 4.0](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/610116c7-3817-40ff-857b-5d41e8511043).</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticResultValue>

trans-unit.source: Assigns a semantic key to one or more <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder"></xref> objects used to create a speech recognition grammar.
trans-unit.target: Tilordner en semantisk nøkkel til én eller flere <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder"> </xref> objekter som brukes til å opprette en tale recognition grammatikk.

trans-unit.source: Because of implicit conversions, the `builders` argument supports <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticResultValue>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticResultKey>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Choices>, and <xref:System.String> objects as well.
trans-unit.target: På grunn av implisitt konvertering av `builders` argumentet støtter <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticResultValue>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticResultKey>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Choices>, og <xref:System.String>objekter samt.</xref:System.String> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Choices> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticResultKey> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticResultValue>

trans-unit.source: For more information on implicit conversions, see <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder.op_Implicit%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon om implisitt konvertering, kan du se <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder.op_Implicit%2A>.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder.op_Implicit%2A>

trans-unit.source: When performing a recognition operation, the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder> objects provided in the `builders` argument are treated as sequential.
trans-unit.target: Når du utfører en operasjon for gjenkjenning av <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder>objekter som er angitt i den `builders` argumentet behandles som sekvensielle.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder>

trans-unit.source: For example, if the following <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticResultValue> is used to construct a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar>, input to the recognition engine must contain the words "the quick brown fox" in sequence to be recognized.
trans-unit.target: For eksempel hvis følgende <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticResultValue>brukes til å lage en <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar>, recognition motoren inndata må inneholde ordene "god stil" i sekvensen føres.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticResultValue>

trans-unit.source: ```c# SemanticResultKey stringTest=new SemanticResultKey( "stringTest", new GrammarBuilder[] { new GrammarBuilder("the"), new GrammarBuilder("quick"), new GrammarBuilder("brown"), new GrammarBuilder("fox")}); ``` The `semanticResultKey` argument contains the tag used to access the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticValue> which might be returned.
trans-unit.target: ```c# SemanticResultKey stringTest=new SemanticResultKey( "stringTest", new GrammarBuilder[] { new GrammarBuilder("the"), new GrammarBuilder("quick"), new GrammarBuilder("brown"), new GrammarBuilder("fox")}); ```Den `semanticResultKey` argumentet inneholder koden brukes til å tilgang den <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticValue>som skal returneres.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticValue>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticValue.Value%2A> of the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticValue> is determined by the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder> instances provided by the `builders` parameter.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticValue.Value%2A>av den <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticValue>fastsettes av den <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder>forekomster som er angitt av den `builders` parameteren.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticValue> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticValue.Value%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder> objects contain no defining instances of <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticResultValue>, the value of the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticValue> is `null`.
trans-unit.target: Hvis den <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder>objekter inneholder ingen definere forekomster av <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticResultValue>, verdien for den <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticValue>er `null`.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticValue> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticResultValue> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder> objects provided in the `builders` parameter provide an untagged (not associated with a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticResultKey> object) <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticResultValue> instance that is used by the recognition logic, that instance of <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticResultValue> will define the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticValue.Value%2A> property of the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticValue> that is produced.
trans-unit.target: Hvis den <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder>objekter som er angitt i den `builders` parameteren gir en kodet (ikke er tilknyttet en <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticResultKey>objektet) <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticResultValue>-forekomst som er brukt av recognition logikken, denne forekomsten av <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticResultValue>definerer den <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticValue.Value%2A>for den <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticValue>som produseres.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticValue> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticValue.Value%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticResultValue> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticResultValue> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticResultKey> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder>

trans-unit.source: There should be one, and only one, untagged <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticResultValue> instance in the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder> objects specified by the `builders` parameter.
trans-unit.target: Det må være en, og bare én ukodede <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticResultValue>serverforekomsten i den <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder>objekter som angis av den `builders` parameteren.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticResultValue>

trans-unit.source: If multiple instances of untagged <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticResultValue> are associated with the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticResultKey>, each will attempt to the set the value of the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticValue> produced in the recognition result.
trans-unit.target: Hvis flere forekomster av ukodede <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticResultValue>er knyttet til den <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticResultKey>, hver forsøker å settet verdien for den <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticValue>produseres i resultatet recognition.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticValue> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticResultKey> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticResultValue>

trans-unit.source: This is not permitted, and the recognizer will generate an exception when it attempts to use a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar> created using such a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticResultKey> instance.
trans-unit.target: Dette er ikke tillatt, og gjenkjenneren vil generere et unntak når den prøver å bruke en <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar>opprettet ved hjelp av for eksempel en <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticResultKey>forekomsten.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticResultKey> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar>

trans-unit.source: Instances of <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticResultValue> contained in the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder> objects specified by the `builders` parameter and already associated with another <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticResultKey> have no effect on the current <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticResultKey> instance.
trans-unit.target: Forekomster av <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticResultValue>i den <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder>objekter som angis av den `builders` parameteren og allerede knyttet til en annen <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticResultKey>har ingen innvirkning på gjeldende <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticResultKey>forekomsten.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticResultKey> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticResultKey> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticResultValue>

trans-unit.source: The tag to be used as a semantic key to access the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticValue"></xref> instance associated with the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder"></xref> objects specified by the `builders` argument.
trans-unit.target: Koden som skal brukes som en semantisk for å få tilgang til den <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticValue"> </xref> forekomst som er knyttet til den <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder"> </xref> objekter som angis av den `builders` argumentet.

trans-unit.source: An array of grammar components that will be associated with a <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticValue"></xref> object accessible with the tag defined in `semanticResultKey`.
trans-unit.target: En matrise av grammatikk komponenter som vil være knyttet til en <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticValue"> </xref> objektet som er tilgjengelig med koden som er definert i `semanticResultKey`.

trans-unit.source: Assigns a semantic key to one or more <xref:System.String> instances used to create a speech recognition grammar.
trans-unit.target: Tilordner en semantisk nøkkel til én eller flere <xref:System.String>forekomster som brukes til å opprette en tale recognition grammatikk.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: When performing a recognition operation, the <xref:System.String> objects used in the `phrases` parameter are treated as sequential.
trans-unit.target: Når du utfører en operasjon for gjenkjenning av <xref:System.String>objekter som brukes i den `phrases` parameteren behandles som sekvensielle.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: For example, if the following <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticResultValue> is used to construct a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar>, input to the recognition engine must contain the words "the quick brown fox" in sequence to be recognized.
trans-unit.target: For eksempel hvis følgende <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticResultValue>brukes til å lage en <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar>, recognition motoren inndata må inneholde ordene "god stil" i sekvensen føres.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticResultValue>

trans-unit.source: ```c# SemanticResultKey stringTest=new SemanticResultKey("stringTest", new string[] { "the", "quick", "brown", "fox"}); ``` The `semanticResultKey` argument determines the key used to access the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticValue> which might be returned.
trans-unit.target: ```c# SemanticResultKey stringTest=new SemanticResultKey("stringTest", new string[] { "the", "quick", "brown", "fox"}); ```Den `semanticResultKey` argumentet bestemmer nøkkelen som brukes til å tilgang av <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticValue>som skal returneres.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticValue>

trans-unit.source: If you construct a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar> using a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder> object that contains a semantic key with an array of string objects, the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticValue.Value%2A> of the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticValue> produced by a recognition operation will be the string used in recognition.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du oppretter en <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar>ved hjelp av en <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder>objekt som inneholder en semantisk nøkkel med en matrise av streng objekter i <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticValue.Value%2A>av den <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticValue>generert av en operasjon for føring blir Formatstrengen som brukes i gjenkjenning.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticValue> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticValue.Value%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar>

trans-unit.source: In the preceding example, this means that <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticValue.Value%2A> would be "the quick brown fox".
trans-unit.target: Dette betyr at i det forrige eksemplet <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticValue.Value%2A>ville bli "god stil".</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticValue.Value%2A>

trans-unit.source: The tag to be used access the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticValue"></xref> instance associated with the <xref:System.String>objects specified by the `phrases` argument.
trans-unit.target: Koden skal brukes tilgang av <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticValue"> </xref> forekomst som er knyttet til den <xref:System.String>objekter som angis av den `phrases` argumentet.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: One or more <xref:System.String> objects, whose concatenated text will be associated with a <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticValue"></xref> object accessible with the tag defined in `semanticResultKey`.
trans-unit.target: Én eller flere <xref:System.String>objekter, der sammenkoblet teksten skal være tilknyttet en <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticValue"> </xref> objektet som er tilgjengelig med koden som er definert i `semanticResultKey`.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: Returns an instance of <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder"></xref> constructed from the current <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticResultKey"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer en forekomst av <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder"> </xref> konstruert fra gjeldende <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticResultKey"> </xref> forekomsten.

trans-unit.source: The use of <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticResultValue.ToGrammarBuilder%2A> is equivalent to using the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder> constructor which takes <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticResultKey> as an argument (<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder.%23ctor%28System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticResultKey%29>).
trans-unit.target: Bruk av <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticResultValue.ToGrammarBuilder%2A>tilsvarer å bruke den <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder>konstruktør som tar <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticResultKey>som et argument (<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder.%23ctor%28System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticResultKey%29>).</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder.%23ctor%28System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticResultKey%29> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticResultKey> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticResultValue.ToGrammarBuilder%2A>

trans-unit.source: Returns an instance of <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder"></xref> constructed from the current <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticResultKey"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer en forekomst av <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder"> </xref> konstruert fra gjeldende <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticResultKey"> </xref> forekomsten.
